entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023
